title: Alex Jones Show - 2013 Aug 22 TH [sebaygo1]
description:
The Alex Jones Show
Thursday, 22 August 2013


[sebaygo1]


Show Description
................

From the Infowars web site :: Alex covers the move toward war against Syria following a questionable chemical attack on this Thursday, August 22 edition of The Alex Jones Show. Alex talks about the suspicious character of the alleged attack in Damascus, including telltale signs a video of victims may be staged, and Russia's contention the entire event is an orchestrated provocation and a false flag event. 

Alex also covers news that Michael Hastings, the assassinated journalist who went after the Pentagon and the CIA, feared his Mercedes was tampered with prior to the "accident" that claimed his life. 

On today's show, Alex welcomes back in-studio San Antonio attorney Jamie Balagia, co-author of Texas DWI Survival Guide: A Citizen's Protection Manual, a book designed to help protect the average citizen from over zealous DWI enforcement.

Not mentioned in the official show description, dentist Corey Gold is Alex's third hour guest. Gold is affiliated with Youngevity, manufacturer of many of the products sold at InfowarsHealth.com.

Audio problems in the second hour were native to the GCN podcast file.
